statement: The experiment runner should be replaced or minimized in favor of workflow-driven scheduling and a minimal CLI that only enqueues work, to reduce duplicated orchestration logic.
rationale: A separate runner layer exists outside the Convex workflows and is not part of the original blueprint; user dislikes the runner-centric approach.
keyAssumptions: Workflow-driven scheduling can cover current runner responsibilities.
validationCriteria: Blueprint plan defines orchestration via workflows and removes reliance on local runner logic.
critiquePoints: Some local scripting may still be useful for batch sweep generation.
questions: Should a small CLI remain to generate experiment configs only?
